original_text: He was twenty-five years old when he began to reign, and he reigned sixteen years in Jerusalem.
korean_text: 요담이 왕위에 오를 때에 나이가 이십오 세요 예루살렘에서 다스린 지 십육 년이라

sentences.original_text: He was twenty-five years old when he began to reign
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 통치를 시작했을 때는 스물다섯 살이었다.

sentences.original_text: and he reigned sixteen years in Jerusalem
